text.section: The business and affairs of a savings and loan association shall be managed under the direction of a board of directors.
A savings and loan association shall have at least 5 directors, as its charter or bylaws provide.

section.section:
Each director of a savings and loan association shall be:
A citizen of the United States; and
A member of the association or the holder of a savings account in the association.
At least two-thirds of the directors shall be residents of this State.
Each nonresident director shall be approved by the Division Director as qualified to serve.

text.section: Subsection (c)(1)(ii) of this section does not apply to any member of a board of directors who was serving on a board before July 1, 1980.
